# Start

Themes : quartz, cyborg, superhero

-   Started project by creating new react project using `vite` bundler by giving the command
    -   `npm create vite@latest`
    -   `cd` into the project directory
    -   `npm install` or `npm i`
    -   `npm run dev` to start the development server
